com.bigdata.blueprints

Class BigdataGraphFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bigdata.blueprints.BigdataGraphFactory

  • public class BigdataGraphFactory
extends Object
    Helper class to create BigdataGraph instances.
    Author:
    mikepersonick

      • connect

        public static BigdataGraph connect(String host,
                   int port)
        Deprecated. As of version 1.5.2, you should use one of the connect methods with a sparqlEndpointURL. See http://wiki.blazegraph.com/wiki/index.php/NanoSparqlServer#Active_URLs
        Connect to a remote bigdata instance. FIXME This does not parameterize the value of the ContextPath. See BigdataStatics.getContextPath().

      • connect

        public static BigdataGraph connect(String sparqlEndpointURL)
        Connect to a remote bigdata instance.
        Parameters:
        sparqlEndpointURL - The URL of the SPARQL end point. This will be used to read and write on the graph using the blueprints API.

      • open

        public static BigdataGraph open(String file,
                boolean create)
                         throws Exception
        Open an existing persistent local bigdata instance. If a journal does not exist at the specified location and the boolean create flag is true a journal will be created at that location.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • create

        public static BigdataGraph create(String file)
                           throws Exception
        Create a persistent local bigdata instance. If a journal does not exist at the specified location, then a journal will be created at that location.
        Throws:
        Exception
